entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:31 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Blowing Snow, -19.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 11:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 68 %

Dewpoint: -23.6°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 25 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 41 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing early in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 48 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
